name: songwriter
short_description: Develop software that allows the user to generate song templates. Templates are based on existing song structures that must be researched and entered into a database. Chord progressions will populate the structures. The chord progressions will be based on common western progressions which must be researched and entered. The user will have the option to change the song key to accommodate their specific preference. The user will have the option to select a mood factor to further refine the structure.
summary: Creates song structures and populates chord progressions.
